definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
to cut down/to fell/to dispatch an expedition against/to attack/to boast/Taiwan pr. [fa1]

sentences.chinese: 怀疑永远是拖着沉重的步伐。

sentences.english: If you're sure-footed, they want to follow in your footsteps.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的步伐坚定，人们就会跟从你。

sentences.english: We have to quicken our pace.
Warm-ups and cool-downs generally involve doing your activity at a slower pace and reduced intensity.
sentences.chinese: 热身和降温通常是以较慢的步伐和强度来锻炼。

sentences.english: Earth is working her way back out of distortion in the ever-increasing pace of time.
sentences.chinese: 地球正在不断加速的时间步伐中脱离扭曲。

sentences.english: We should abandon all outmoded conventions and customs to keep pace with new era.
sentences.chinese: 我们要抛弃陈规陋习以跟上新时代的步伐。

sentences.english: With the accelerated pace of economic globalization, Matthew Effect obviously show.
sentences.chinese: 随着经济全球化步伐加快，马太效应愈加明显。

sentences.english: It kept step, and marched alongside down the dense crowds mile after mile.
sentences.chinese: 它保持着步伐，沿着多少里密扎扎的人群前进。

sentences.english: Releases and resettlements are now happening more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 释放和重新安置的步伐已经加快。

sentences.english: Again, Schroepfer says the pace is maintained by Zuckerberg himself.
sentences.chinese: 再次，斯瑞普菲认为，扎克伯格自己维护这个步伐。

sentences.english: Translation: We should make great effort to accelerate the pace of economic reform.
sentences.chinese: 我们应大力加快经济改革的步伐。

sentences.english: Sunny & Keen's products are what the world chooses to walk on!
sentences.chinese: 香港晴沣材料供应公司的商品是引领世界的步伐。

sentences.english: Increase your pace gradually, so your body picks up momentum.
sentences.chinese: 逐渐加快步伐，使你的身体获得动力。

sentences.english: A triathlete's stride is critical to his or her running performance.
sentences.chinese: 铁人三项的步伐对于他或她的跑步成绩至关重要。

sentences.english: The Komondor takes long strides, is very agile and light on his feet.
sentences.chinese: 可蒙犬的步伐大，足爪非常轻巧敏捷。

sentences.english: Sixth, the pace of supporting reforms will be speeded up, with focus on the establishment of a social security system.
sentences.chinese: 加快配套改革步伐，特别是社会保障制度的建立。

definition: to catch up with/to keep pace with
to step out/to take a (first) step
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
